text: 28|57|geudeul-eun malhagil uliga geudaewa hamkke bog-eum-eul ttaleundamyeon ulineun uliui ttang-eseo butjabhyeo ganila mal hajiman hananim-eun geudeul-eul wihayeo anjeonhan seong-yeog-eul malyeonhayeo geugos-e uliui yangsig-in modeun jonglyuui gwail eul juji anihaessdeonyo geudeul daedasu ga alji moshadeola
